author: Rachel Miller, Amy Rose Spiegel, Casey Johnston
title: The Answer to All of Your Social Distancing Loophole Questions Is No
description: Viruses don’t operate by potential carriers’ best intentions. They operate exclusively by our actions.
content: Since the first case of the novel coronavirus was confirmed in the United States, my friends, colleagues, and I have regularly found ourselves in group chats discussing different versions of the same question: Is [this ill-advised thing I want to do] OK right… [+9650 chars]
